statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.name: offensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

article.headline: Howard 116, Virginia Military 111
article.story: WASHINGTON (AP) -- Darryl Hudson was perfect on six free throws in the final two minutes and came up with a crucial steal to help Howard hold off VMI for a 116-111 victory Saturday. Hudson scored 21 of his 28 points in the second half and Eugene Myatt scored a game-high 41 to help the Bison (2-3) blow past their previous single-game high of 86 points. Reggie Williams finished with 30 points for VMI (3-4), his fourth 30-point game of the season. Howard was able to run with VMI, which plays at a frenetic pace and defended with full-court pressure almost all game. The Keydets entered the night as the nation's highest scoring team, averaging 104.7 points per game. The Bison seemed to relish the fast tempo and didn't try to slow down play despite committing 30 turnovers. Howard went on an 18-2 run early in the second half to erase a 52-47 halftime deficit. Jeron Smith's two free throws with 9:35 remaining gave the Bison an 89-71 lead. VMI clawed back, however, with a barrage of three-pointers. Keydets guard Travis Holmes hit a three-pointer to tie the game at 107 with 1:52 remaining. Hudson put Howard back in front, however, by sinking two free throws. Hudson also came up big on the defensive end, intercepting a pass from Keydets guard Fred Robinson. He was immediately fouled and made both free throws.
